name: BusyBox-1.13.0
description: BusyBox version 1.13.0 was identified with multiple high-severity vulnerabilities. Version evidence was found in the binary strings. This version is vulnerable to buffer overflows and arbitrary code execution via crafted inputs.

name: pppd-2.4.5
description: pppd version 2.4.5 was identified through compiler version and string patterns, though exact version isn't explicitly stated. No direct CVEs were found for this version in NVD, but version identification needs verification.
code_snippet:
pppd version %s
Usage: %s [ options ], where options are:...

name: dnsmasq-2.52
description: dnsmasq version 2.52 was identified through string analysis. While no direct CVE vulnerabilities were found in this version, the presence of critical vulnerabilities in later versions indicates potential risks may exist.

name: miniupnpd-1.4
description: miniupnpd version 1.4 was confirmed with CVE-2013-0229 vulnerability allowing SSDP-based denial of service through buffer over-read.

name: Linux-Kernel-2.6.22
description: Linux kernel version 2.6.22 was identified through directory structure. This extremely outdated version has multiple known vulnerabilities including privilege escalation and denial of service.
